Package civitas.celestis.math.matrix

Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.math.matrix.Matrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
Copyable<Matrix>, Iterable<Double>
public class Matrix extends Object implements Iterable<Double>, Copyable<Matrix>
A rectangular array of doubles.
